name: Trippy Minesweeper
description:
i added some visual feedback to the favorite sensations i feel, when playing this timeless classic.

I used Unreal Engine 4 with Epic's Starter Content and the Puzzle Template. Full Blueprint Project.

I did not optimize the game, so the size is a little over the top.

Rules: Click on a field. Not dead yet? Great! The Numbers you see indicate how many mines are scattered around the tile you clicked on. Use Right Click to mark a tile as dangerous. Are you smart and lucky enough to defuse all mines?

Hope you enjoy :)
